charinfo.name: Uchiha Itachi (S)
charinfo.description: Uchiha Itachi (S) is a member of Akatsuki, and the brother of Uchiha Sasuke. He has mastered the sharingan completely. Original Designs: pacotacobell and hachiman

abilities.name: Susanoo Activation
abilities.description: Uchiha Itachi (S) activates Susanoo, and he takes 10 affliction damage*. Each turn he gains 5 permanent stacking destructible defense and his skills become their alternate versions. If used again, his skills return to their original versions and he loses all destructible defense from this skill.

abilities.name: Weakened Amaterasu
abilities.description: This skill deals 15 affliction damage to 1 enemy for 2 turns. This skill  becomes Totsuka Sword during Susanoo Activation.

abilities.name: Crow Genjutsu
abilities.description: Using crows as a medium, Itachi (S) places a genjutsu on one enemy for 1 turn. If that enemy uses an offensive skill their physical or ranged skills will be stunned for 2 turns. This skill is invisible and becomes Yatta Mirror during Susanoo Activation.

abilities.name: Maneuvering Dodge
abilities.description: This skill makes Uchiha Itachi (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
